author: swayand
body:
Most of the code has been rewritten to adapt Tau Embedding for run2 conditions. Details were presented here:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/578066/contributions/2343771/attachments/1358062/2053774/stefan_wayand_Okt_19_reco_emb.pdf
title: Fixing code of tau embedding (TauAnalysis/MCEmbeddingTools) for run2 needs
